description: The most advanced, comprehensive, and secure webOS app for Salesforce.com. Features include: full access to your Accounts, Contacts, Opportunities Leads, Events and Tasks. Call and email directly from your Salesforce.com records, as well map the locations of Accounts, Contacts and Leads. Includes the ability to search, view, create, edit and delete records on-the-fly. Synchronizes with your Salesforce.com server so you have the most current information at your fingertips. This is a BETA application, please visit the links found on the About screen to provide your feedback. Depending upon your activation method, you may need to retrieve a security token from Salesforce. Please refer to our help content for more information. You will need an Enterprise, Unlimited or Developer account on Salesforce.com to utilize this app.
